Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.name: addSubview(_:constrainedBy:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.abstract: Adds the subview as a child and apply the constraints described.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.name: addSubview(_:insets:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.abstract: Convenience method that adds the subview as a child and apply the same inset to the 4 edges.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.name: pin(_:to:of:relatedBy:multiplier:constant:priority:isActive:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC10Sw.abstract: Helper method to create a constraint between self and another view.
